H0.text: What is the least number of shots that a competitor can take to complete 18 holes of golf. 15

H1.text: What is the least number of shots that a competitor can take to complete 18 holes of golf. 22

H2.text: What is the least number of shots that a competitor can take to complete 18 holes of golf. 12

H3.text: What is the least number of shots that a competitor can take to complete 18 holes of golf. 18

A4.text: The world record on one round of minigolf is 18 strokes on 18 holes.

A5.text: Nearly all par 4 and par 5 holes are too long for golfers to reach in a single shot.

A6.text: Eighteen-hole courses typically total to an overall par score of 70 to 72 for a complete round.

A7.text: A perfect round (score of 54 on a par-72 course) is most commonly described as scoring a birdie on all 18 holes, but no player has ever recorded a perfect round in a professional tournament.
